Module ica.chatviewer
Package ica.chatviewer

Class HelperFunctions

java.lang.Object
ica.chatviewer.HelperFunctions
public class HelperFunctions extends Object
This class provides helper functions for the ChatViewer application. It's responsible for handling files and images in the application.

  • Method Details

    • OpenFile

      public static File OpenFile()
      Prompts the user to select a file to open. The user will only be able to select files with a ".msg" extension.
      Returns:
      the selected file, or null if the user did not select a file

    • InitImages

      public static void InitImages(Class originalClass)
      Initializes the images (emojis) that can be displayed in the chat messages.
      Parameters:
      originalClass - the class from which this method is called. Used to get the class loader to load the images.

    • GetEmoji

      public static javafx.scene.image.ImageView GetEmoji(boolean isHappy)
      Gets an ImageView object representing an emoji. The emoji will be happy or sad depending on the isHappy parameter.
      Parameters:
      isHappy - if true, returns a happy emoji; otherwise, returns a sad emoji
      Returns:
      an ImageView object representing the emoji
